mapper.select: SELECT username FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT password FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT enabled FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT email FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT r.authority FROM users u LEFT OUTER JOIN authorities a ON u.username = a.username LEFT OUTER JOIN roles r ON a.roleid = r.roleid WHERE u.username= #{username};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, enabled, email) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{enabled}, #{email});
